website_summaries.verdict: Despite some sporadic quality issues, this is generally a good-quality ukulele for beginners at a great price.
pros: Made from maple, with fingerboard and bridge made of rosewood
Premium Italian Aquila Nylgut strings provide high-quality sound
A sturdy instrument with decent sound
Accessories pack includes a strap, picks, and a gig bag
cons: Some customers say this option doesn't stay in tune well, while others point to scattered defects involving the frets, tuning pegs, and other parts of the instrument

customer_reviews.title: Best Starter Ukulele On Amazon at This Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Ok so Im giving it 5 stars, and this is on the bell curve of cheap ukes. I teach ukulele and have purchased a number of $30-$40 ukuleles. I teach a L{earn} Ukulele class where students earn points for practice and can earn a ukulele when they reach 100... Two of my students requested specific colors, I ordered these based on reviews, and let me say sonically they are far superior to any other ukulele in this price range. and they are pretty tough. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eighty Bug

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this find
customer_reviews.text: This truly is the best price for a soprano ukulele. Granted, it is laminated wood, but you wouldn't be able to tell. The structure is good and the strings are better then the ones you'll find on a store bought ukulele (I know this from past purchase at a store). I had trouble keeping my strings tuned for more then a few seconds, but someone informed me to tighten the screw. After I tightened them, they stayed in tune beautifully. I am very happy with this find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this junk
customer_reviews.text: Children's toy junk do not even bother its flimsy doesn't tune sending back .
customer_reviews.author: Dusty rose

customer_reviews.title: This $35 ukulele opened up a world of music to me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a year ago and it was my gateway to serious music study. I now own 2 serious ukuleles in addtion. However, I love my Hola hm-21. It is a real musical instrument--not a toy. It sounds sweet and mellow, has accurate-ish intonation, and after a little work on the nut, great action. I use this as my travel uke now. For $35 it can get damaged in an overhead bin and I won't be too upset. It hangs on the wall with my Kala and my Ohana and it gets played regularly. You can't go wrong with this ukulele
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners ukulele
customer_reviews.text: So I got the turquoise blue ukulele and I honestly love it! I downloaded some free apps to help me tune it, and have been practicing daily. The biggest “issue” I had was that it was out of tune so quickly. I even emailed support, and they assured me it’s because of the stretching. He was right, and i tune it way less now. My toddler plays on it too and we just all around have a great time with it. I purchased this one because of the good reviews and low price. I’d never played before so this is a great practice ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchface

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy Uke!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st Uke and I'm very happy with it! I wanted a Uke that was reasonable priced with a good sound while I figured out if this hobby was for me. The strings took daily tuning for the first 10 days or so (buy an electronic tuner!) and now they are broken in they perform well. Frankly, as I said, I couldn't be happier -- plus I loved the color options!
customer_reviews.author: ScotDeerie

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a eye catching uke for easy travel. I needed a soprano uke to travel with so I decided on Hola brand for the price. I read the reviews and many mentioned tuning problems. String instruments will always need time to stretch. Mine took about two weeks for the strings to stabilize. I played and gently stretched them regularly. It’s become my new favorite. The strings are soft and make for easy bends when playing bluesy type songs. Has a pretty nice tone.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t actually get lessons
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele is nice, but we never got free lessons. Emailed twice (I don’t think u should have to email them it the first place. They say included so u should automatically get them included) completely useless for my kids without the lessons, so now I got to go hunt down lessons somewhere else. I don’t care how good the product is, u need to make good on what u offer or it’s not worth time to buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Harpel

customer_reviews.title: Sounds the way it looks.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds that come out of this instrument are equivalent to a ferril cat screaching in discomfort. The finish is smooth like a nice plastic toy. I don't wish my enemies to purchase this ukulele. I didn't return it just so I can show people personally how it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Ben from Seaside

customer_reviews.title: i bought my daughter a cheaper version of a ukulele but she didn't like it and asked me to buy her another one ...
customer_reviews.text: a flood destroyed many personal items of my children. i bought my daughter a cheaper version of a ukulele but she didn't like it and asked me to buy her another one just like she had. So i had to repurchase another one. She is happy with the Ukulele. The seller sent it right away. I am happy with the seller and the ukulele. The other Ukulele wouldn't stay in tune and this one holds a tune much longer.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Fun Orange Soprano
customer_reviews.text: A good saprano uke for the price. I bought this back in 2013 and it's still paying great! Paint is chipping a little on back near neck and frets are still vary sharp. I'm to lazy to sand them. All in all stays in tune better then a Kala soprano at $110 and has a brighter sound. I sometimes wonder if I got lucky. Looking at reviews other people have been liking this uke, as I do, knowing what your getting at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: popwisdom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet little uke
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 11-year-old daughter for Christmas, and you cannot beat the price/quality factor. It's a great uke to learn on, and my daughter hasn't put it down since she got it. The strap is helpful, too, but it's a good idea to Google how to actually use it (which we needed to) 'cause I had no idea how it worked. We got her a cute turquoise one, and it was as pretty as we had hoped. The carrying backpack/sack is an added bonus for sure. (I play the guitar, and I still thought the quality of this uke was pretty great. It's not a Martin, but if you're just starting out, you probably shouldn't get a Martin.)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 5 year old daughter. She loved it till it broke. I’m sure it was something she did but have no idea what that was. Have if said that customer service from the company is lacking. She broke the bridge somehow. Contacted the company to get a replacement bridge so I could fix it. Not so much. All they would do is sell me a new one. Like I said it was fine when it showed up. More disappointed with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Scholtz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, with one suggestion
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. It was delivered as expected and everything they told us was in the box was there. I thought it would have 1 pick, but there were 3. The only think I noticed is there were no directions on how to put the strap on or how to tune the ukulele. If those were included that would better help someone who is just learning how to play and take care of the instrument. However, we did find a YouTube video on how to attach the strap. We'll be working with my daughter's teacher on how to tune the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: S. Agusto-Cox

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ukulele !
customer_reviews.text: Life changing purchase; this Ukulele was something I have always dreamed of having, but we don't have any local Ukulele shop in the area. Finding this Ukulele and playing it has changed my life for good. Songs like “Somewhere Over the Rainbow”, “Can't Help Falling in Love”, “Sunday Morning” and “Hey Jude” are just some! I have never been so excited about a musical instrument; it's just a blast at the campfire and on the college campus, everyone thinks I'm so cool now and before I was just a person without a Ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: FrozenAce

customer_reviews.title: A simple, happy little uke for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought the Hola! ukulele, and in the week that I've had it, it's already given me hours of fun trying to pick out my first chords. For the low low price of about 22 dollars, I've got a simple but serviceable little ukulele, not a toy. I was contacted shortly after it arrived by the company, who passed along some advice about letting the nylon strings "season" a bit so that they hold their tune more consistently, and I really appreciate that gesture! It shows that they want their product to succeed. I'm quite happy with this uke and I look forward to strumming some songs soon!
customer_reviews.author: D. Houser

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter Ukelele
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old grandsons birthday. It’s a very nice sounding “Uke” when in tune. I realize that it will take awhile for it to stay in tune though and will be happy when it finally does. It’s a beautiful color and I hope it holds up well for him. The strap is a very nice quality. The bag isn’t bad ...it’s just ok. I’ve purchased a replacement already. I’m not saying this is high quality because it’s not..the tuning pegs could be better but for the price I paid I’m very happy with it. I haven’t tried the month of free lessons yet because I’m waiting for his birthday to start those with him.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wold

customer_reviews.title: Just Short of 4-Stars!
customer_reviews.text: This little ukulele surprised me straight out of the box! It's definitely sturdy and the sound is pretty nice, even if the strings are a very cheap plastic. In all honesty, strings are the only thing that keeps it from 5-stars. Due to their quality, it requires constant re-tuning of the instrument itself, but I'll eventually change them to more professional ones. Over than that a great buy and the free lessons are a bonus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aloha is here!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, packaged securely. Comes with a carrying bag, strap, and three picks. My 6 year old loves it and hasn't put it down since she opened it. She's been wanting to learn guitar but my acoustic is too big for her. This is the perfect size for little hands! Also, the color is so vibrant! She thinks it looks like the ocean. What a wonderful product to showcase one part of Hawaiian culture. Looking for recommendations for good beginner ukulele books!
customer_reviews.author: L. E.

customer_reviews.title: Good fun.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. It is a blast to play and very addictive. Sounds really nice too. I read a lot of reviews about breaking in the strings. We have been playing it a lot over 2 weeks and 3 of 4 strings will not hold their tune at all. Kinda disappointed with that. I think the tuners are actually releasing tension. If not for that, this would be a 5 star review. Over all, well worth it though the purchase. My daughter is in love with it (9 year old).
customer_reviews.author: pressm4n

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ukulele! Good strings and sounds great! Well worth the price . Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Link

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable beautiful turquoise ukulele
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. It came in a turquoise color very pretty and appears to be very well made. My son plays guitar so it's going to be fun to watch him help teach her to play a ukulele. Not really sure how to charge easy to learn only time will tell but there's so much out there on YouTube I'm sure she will have no problem learning. She strums on it day and night one of her most favorite Christmas gifts of all!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So much value and so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I love my light blue use and my granddaughter loves her black one. They are very well made, the customer service is above and beyond what you would expect, and the Ike’s come with two months of free lessons! Adam, the proprietor, not only contacts you by email concerning your purchase but also provides some informative videos on Amazon even before you order. I intend to spend the fall and winter whiling away the hours strumming on my beautiful blue ukulele!
customer_reviews.author: Lumiere

customer_reviews.title: Rough start, but ending was very happy
customer_reviews.text: We had a rough start with our new Ukulele that I purchased for my son as a Christmas gift. But before I got ready to return it, I emailed the seller explaining that my son was having a hard time tuning it and our tuner wasn't registering the right cords properly. Turned out that these instruments are shipped with loose strings to protect the neck. (I had no idea). After learning that, my son had no problem tuning his new Ukulele and is so very happy with his Christmas gift now and I am also so very happy that I didn't return it disappointed. We couldn't be happier. Great Ukulele and great price. Looking forward to the lessons online.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Most fav for my 15 month old daughter
customer_reviews.text: NO REGRETS! A little early but it was so worth the purchase I bought this for my 15 month old daughter, I am on a faster place with her developments she is just a fast learner it shocking me! But it was an automatic love for this ukelele she just simply got the hang of it and her fingers it was like she felt the sound through her little fingers of all her toys she never easily walks away or let this one go until she spends a good time playing it. One of her most fav toys and I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a great starter Ukulele and it looks like the strings will ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm no music guru and heck I'm probably tone deaf, but this little Ukulele has made my day! I think it's a great starter Ukulele and it looks like the strings will be easy to replace if I should ever want to. The paint job is cute and the whole thing is quite smooth and pleasant to hold. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: PixiePixel

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Ukulele for my 9yo daughter for Christmas this year! Her one wish was a guitar after the little toy one she had broke a while back! This is far nicer than I expected and sounds just lovely strumming the strings - can't wait for her to open it on Christmas morning and be delighted! We chose the PURPLE and the finish is absolutely perfect - I am a total perfectionist! My only dismay is that the neck cord it came with should be a more subdued black - it is a rather colorful strap that draws attention to itself but since it is used optionally it is up to the user if they desire to use it!
customer_reviews.author: gizgo

customer_reviews.title: Good learning tool for stringed instruments!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this ukulele to my 7 year old granddaughter for Christmas and she was thrilled. She especially liked the color, a beautiful shiny purple. I think she will enjoy it as she learns that she can actually accompany herself when she sings! Her mom and dad can help her with the tuning until she gets the knack of that....but it is just right for her hands and will be a good learning tool in learning about stringed instruments. Like any new instrument, it will be awhile before it holds tune very well. It comes with everything that she will need except a chord wheel!
customer_reviews.author: careful consumer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this ukulele! I would highly recommend it, plus it has a great price tag. It has good quality strings and it is a nice color ( I got the blue) and it is made with good quality materials. Also, at the beginning, it will go out of tune, but for me it was only for about an hour. Then it held.its tune very well. Also, the strap,bag and picks are very nice because I am a total beginner and it was nice that it was all included. All in all, this ukulele is good quality and very fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but expect to invest in new ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but expect to invest in new strings. These won't hold tune. It loses tune in seconds. I adjusted it once every day for about 3 weeks until it was able to hold tune long enough to play, then lose tune in a few hours. I just bought new strings for $10. 4 stars because strings are cheap, just expect to replace them, original strings on the ukulele are simply useless.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ukulele and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl wanted a ukulele since her music teacher uses one at her school. I searched a few and figured this was one that she could afford and would be easy to work with. Was I ever pleased with the sound! It is a warm as my guitar yet bright a bright tone. She has been taking lessons now and the strings are fairly settled in so keeping it in tune is easier. But even if I am pleased with it she is more so! She especially likes that it is purple, her favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Not this one

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Over all I'm satisfied with this ukulele. The second fret marker is a little high and the action is a little on the low side so I get some buzzing when fretting the c string on the first fret. The only other problem I have is that the tuning peg on the a string is machined poorly and is cutting notches into my string, I contacted the seller and I'm getting a replacement peg. Other than those two small flaws this ukulele sounds amazing it's all wood and is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wayne

customer_reviews.title: The Hola ukulele hit a "high note" with me.
customer_reviews.text: The instrument itself seems to be of good quality. My only issue is the advertised "two months of free lessons" which didn't pan out because the third party online lessons company "didn't have any beginner lessons at this time" -- even though they start the clock on your two-month time frame. I wrote to the Hola representative (owner?) and he was completely, immediately and satisfyingly responsive. I would say Hola is a good company to buy from and deal with. Now if I can just master that C7 chord...!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: This Uke is pulling apart.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for Christmas presents. Both bridges where “coming up” off the uke, which is a very bad thing as stringed instruments go. Means the string tension will pull the instrument apart soon. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graham

customer_reviews.title: Constant Tuning
customer_reviews.text: While this uke is very pretty and has a beautiful sound, it will NOT keep in tune. I’ve played it almost every day for the past 3 weeks and it needs tuning every time I pick it up (even after playing for about 5 min it needs to be retuned). I know the strings need a warm up period to get stretched, but tuning every day for 3 weeks....they should be stretched by now. Maybe it’s the one I got, but just be aware that it needs to be tuned a lot; even in the middle of playing a song.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: Great value; Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my young daughter who wanted a pink ukelele. The quality is great and it comes with a pull-string bag and a strap. The strings will be out of tune initially, but I quickly found a video on YouTube to help me tune it. I also found some YouTube videos to teach myself some chords, and I can now teach my daughter. Very happy with the quality and value of this ukelele and would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Webb

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I compared zillions of ukuleles on Amazon and this one was chosen because of the color and the price. Gift for teen and she loves it. There are some that look like toys or for much younger person. This one looks professional and is good quality. Does not come with a case and it should be protected so I suggest ordering one. Made well and better than expected for price.
customer_reviews.author: christopher j. smith

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant sound!
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying I VERY RARELY do reviews, but thought this one was worth my time...My younger daughter (age 13) bought this ukulele for her sister (age 15) for Christmas as it was on her wish list. My older daughter loved it and when my younger daughter tried playing it, she had to have one too. I knew she truly wanted it because she bought it with her own money! They both have children's sized guitars, but these ukuleles are a much better fit and I feel like I am in Hawaii all the time! You can tune them with free apps online and lots of youtubers have songs to learn by. We ALL love, love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio 13

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, Economical Fun
customer_reviews.text: Hola, I bought this ukulele to learn how to play a ukulele in a series of 4 free classes at my local library. It arrived in great condition and looks wonderful. The strings took a bit of use before they would hold being tuned, and even after several weeks of use, the 'A' string in particular needs constant tuning. For the price and the fun I've gotten out of this first Uke it was MORE than worth the cost. Definitely, pick your color and don't look back. Love it
customer_reviews.author: LauraMerwin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime😊😊😊
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my 8yr old and she has not let it out her hands yet. She'll start her 1st lesson online Tuesday. The packaging was great. The only thing I will say is the holder that goes over the shoulder, it has no attachment to contect it to. I am yet trying to figure out how to attach it to the instrument and her body. My eldest has now requested one for herself. I am so glad she's happy. And I will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: I'm luvin life

customer_reviews.title: Ukulele is an economical, sound purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele is well made and arrived in working order with all of the extras that were identified in the ad. This is a gift for a 5 year old granddaughter who tends to treat her belongings with care. The ukulele does hold it’s tune. The action of the strings is a bit too high off of the fret board, which will make it challenging to play notes clearly.
customer_reviews.author: robert richfield

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Beginner Instrument - recommended by a music teacher!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ukulele for a beginner. I am an elementary school music teacher and I have 6 of these in my classroom, along with several Kala MK-S ukuleles and some Kala Waterman ukuleles (which I am not a huge fan of). Although I do prefer the Kala MK-S over the Hola! brand slightly, I still think these are great quality instruments, especially for the price. These instruments stay in tune very well and I have had no issues with them after having them for 3 years (and having many 5th graders play them)! I recommend this brand or the Makala MK-S (more expensive) to all of my students.
customer_reviews.author: booknerd87

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: The intonation is terrible. You can have the Uke in tune at the nut and by the 3rd fret it is out almost a half step. Every chord played sounds out of tune BECAUSE IT IS. Finger it softly or firmly.. no difference, still out. This is just poorly made. If I paid $20 I might not mind, but not for $50 I will spend the extra and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh (Leah) Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a much-begged-for gift for my kid. I bought the same brand that his summer camp ukulele teacher had, which is this same Hola! brand. The instrument arrived in perfect condition and it's lovely -- the sound is very nice, it does a reasonable job of staying in tune, the materials feel good, and it's even my kid's favorite color. Definitely do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Battey

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old wanted to learn the guitar and a Facebook group I’m in recommended starting with a ukulele. I bought this one and all of my kids enjoy strumming on it. I was happy to realize my guitar tuner app had a ukulele setting that would help me tune. At first the uke didn’t hold the tune long (apparently a common issue with any new nylon stringed instrument), but a courtesy e-mail from the seller explained how to stretch the strings to hold the tune and it has been working wonderfully. I’m very happy with this ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: hfygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and tunable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and a plastic pink guitar made by another company, and I am SO grateful this one is made so well. Very good quality and tunable, and was perfect for my 7-year-old beginner. My son’s favorite color is purple so he was very happy to receive this from Santa. Everything about this is great, from the sound to the quality of the materials to the color. I wish I had purchased my daughter’s from Hola instead, because the one I purchased for her would be returned had it not been a Santa present. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Heart Target

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little Uke!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hola! Ukulele. I needed a small one for travel, and chose this inexpensive item. It is made very well, the color is really nice, and the tone is pretty good. It needs a lot of tuning at first, but this gets better. The canvas bag is good too. I love this uke! It is so cute and works great for a traveler. Hola! does not disappoint! This is a terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: auntyneesy

customer_reviews.title: Violin that will meet your expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is a quality product that has a great sound. What comes in it: It comes with a bag, a strap and three different size picks. Pros: - It's easy to tune and doesn't lose it's tune constantly. - The strings can be hand strum without hurting. - The sound is clean for the price point. Can't complain as it's better than I expected. Cons: - Have to use a separate tuner; but most phone can download a free tuner. Also, I knew it didn't come with a tuner when I bought it, so not really a negative. I like the product and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My little brother (15) desperately wanted a ukulele, so I searched all over the internet for a quality one for my money, and this was just that. It's perfect, and he loves it! It looks really legit as well. Amazing purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Uke
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ukulele, so I admit I don't have a lot of experience to draw from, but so far I absolutely love this thing. I tune it once at the beginning of a practice session and it stays in tune for the rest of the session. The sound is surprisingly true and pretty, especially for an inexpensive, entry-level instrument. The purple color is subtle enough to keep the ukulele from looking like a toy while still giving the instrument a playful appearance. Overall, I'm really impressed with the quality, especially for the price. It's a great little uke for a self-taught beginner like me!
customer_reviews.author: E. Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele came on time. I liked that it came with the picks, bag, and strap. Unfortunately, the strings don't stay in place. Right after I tuned the uke, its strings stretched and 5 min later, it was out of tune. The strings are terrible. It was for my 8 yr old daughter who started to pick up my uke and wanted her own. This one was inexpensive, as I was not ready to make a big investment yet. Sadly, tho, I wouldn't recommend this instrument. It's flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLINE SPEARS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these!! I ordered two for my children. We homeschool and I wanted to add to our collection of instruments. These are beautiful and sound amazing! Both of my kiddos were excited to play them. The ukulele comes with a simple storage bag, picks and a strap plus a free course which is stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first stringed instrument, so my experience is limited. I do have experience with playing other instruments, and I will say the sound quality is really good considering the price. This seems to be a great starter uke for anyone who is looking for a good quality instrument at a low price. I would definitely recommend. I haven't tried the free online classes yet, but you are supposed to get two months for free with the purchase of the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Once the stretch period was over (about 2 days) the ukulele stays in tune for much of the playing time. It has a bright sound and has been a good training instrument for our daughter. The fit and finish of this is not great by any means but at this price point I was not expecting anything amazing, mostly concerned about sound quality that it didn't sound like a toy of which it doesn't. Very pleased considering the low price.
customer_reviews.author: alnz28

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 14 year old daughter who did not know how to play. The owner reached out with helpful tips on how to stretch the strings to keep it in tune longer and offered a link for two months of free lessons. The ukelele is a good quality for the price and my daughter is loving it. She plays it every day and learned to tune it like a pro. I would definitely purchase more products from this company. The customer service is superb.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play and fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to play. I'm not sure how long it takes the strings to stay in tune for longer than a day of use, but hopefully it is soon. This is my first stringed instrument so maybe this is aways the case. Other than that it works awesome and I've learned tons of songs in the first week and a half! It was definitely a good start. I may venture into a guitar soon because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good for children
customer_reviews.text: I know how to play and bought this for my nephew for Christmas 2018. I taught him some chords and how to play "Tonight you belong to me" and he loves it. As most toys go, he played it for about a few weeks regularly and then stopped. However, every couple weeks or so, I hear him strumming in his room. Solid quality, sounds okay considering the nylon strings and you need to tune it before playing. Green is his favorite color and its a fun little instrument to use on rainy day to have some silly music time.
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little uke!
customer_reviews.text: Even with the positive reviews, I was somewhat surprised at how much I like this uke. I purchased it to donate to our library but am considering keeping it and donating one I already own, that was a more expensive instrument. Yes, it has nylon strings, and yes, they have to be stretched some before the instrument will stay in tune. This is NOT a fault of the instrument. It has a nice, bright tone. I would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little instrument
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old grandson, but I fell in love with it! I’m breaking it in for him—nylon strings need lots of retuning in the beginning, so BE PATIENT! The company’s customer service was excellent, giving me tips on how to do this. Love the orange! Lots of online videos to help get u started.
customer_reviews.author: gail g

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ukulele for my son’s 6th birthday. He had asked for a ukulele for his birthday, and after looking at many options, I chose this one due to the color, craftsmanship, and positive reviews. When my son opened his gift, he was thrilled. Although he doesn’t have any experience with ukulele, he immediately started playing with it for at least an hour at the party, and got it out again this morning. Love the color too, and that it comes with picks, strap and a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful Ukulele for beginners (my 10 y/o) and in an array of colors (because you know they will want that). It comes in more of a sack than a case. Honestly, I do not really know much about these instruments, however, my 13 y/o's is of "better quality" and comes in a form fitting harder case. So, all in all, I very much DO recommend this Hola Ukelele.
customer_reviews.author: Dee9274

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Mine had TWO defective tuners (see picture) one on the c and on on the e string. It also had poor intonation down the neck wasn't even close by the 12th fret on the c or e strings. So much for all the glowing reviews. I returned it the day I received the uke and will be ordering another brand uke.
customer_reviews.author: *David*

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ukulele! I have never played the ukulele before and decided I needed to learn on a whim. Turns out, I love to play, but I had no idea that would be the case so I didn't want to spend too much. For the price, the sound is great and the ukulele really looks and feels nice. The strings don't hold their tune at first, but as you continue to play the stretch and the tune lasts much longer. I got a snark ukulele tuner and it's fantastic! I would absolutely recommend you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I got the purple one for my toddler. OMG! It is awesome... Just as pictured. I only had it for a day but I feel like now I have to learn because this is a NICE ukulele..... I ordered the cheapest thinking it will be destroyed in no time. Well well well... My kid is enamored. He is pinching and sliding on the cords, the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: whit

customer_reviews.title: Great for testing the waters
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ukulele/first musical instrument of my own and I've really been enjoying it. I didn't want to go all in on an expensive one only to find out that it wasn't for me, so this was the perfect option. It takes a while for the strings to hold their tune but eventually they stay how you want them. I love that it comes in fun colors, too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Grace

customer_reviews.title: Free lessons with purchase require credit card info
customer_reviews.text: This instrument is beautiful. I purchased from this seller because they offered two months off free lessons with the purchase of their ukulele. Please be advised that in order to receive the lessons, you must enter credit card information. This is not known until after you purchase from them.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D.

customer_reviews.title: Tuning was broken.
customer_reviews.text: We did our best to tune it, but we weren't able to. When we went to the shop, the man who worked there said that the tuning was broken on the first string, and impossible to turn anymore. It is also very cheaply built. You should spend your money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: The Fam

customer_reviews.title: New Ukelele Player
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with my new pink Hola ukelele. It sounds great and works for me as a new player. The little carry bag doubles as a simple backpack/sling. Some people talked about the strings not staying in tune. I got a tuner that i leave on the ukelele all the time. Just tune it quickly before I start playing. Not a big deal. I have only had the instrument for a week so maybe the strings will stretch and stay in tune with more time. Either way, its not a big deal. Its a fun instrument and I am very happy with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: MoeJoe

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two for students in uke club. They love them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these ukes, one purple, one blue for students in our school uke club and they love them. I broke them in for them so they would stay in tune and they play well, especially for the money. I would definitely buy them again if I need to add to the student stock.
customer_reviews.author: R. A.

customer_reviews.title: ... had this uke for a couple months now and like everyone else said
customer_reviews.text: I've had this uke for a couple months now and like everyone else said, you get what you pay for. It's decent instrument if you are just getting started and don't know if you will actually be committed. Decent as in you can play all the notes. Sound quality however leaves a lot to be desired. There's really weird tinny sound that I can't quite explain and the strings that come with the uke are pretty damn bad. Definitely get better strings if you do decide to go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Ukulele and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Ukulele and Fantastic Customer Service! Ordered this for my 7 year old daughter. She loves it! It’s well made, came packaged beautifully and came with a bag, strap and 3 pics. Shipping was super fast! And right after it arrived we received an email from the owner asking us how it arrived and if we were happy with it... wonderful to have real customer service like that! Order from this company! Top Notch!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S. Henriques

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and sold for a great price
customer_reviews.text: As a complete beginner, this is everything I needed. At first I was concerned it didn’t seem to stay in tune but learned this is normal on a new ukulele and the strings needed to be stretched. After a week of playing, the strings are stretched and it stays in tune and sounds great. I’ve used YouTube lessons to learn and free apps to tune...ukulele has become a fun hobby and for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a BEAUTY!! My family are hard to impress but when they saw this ukelele they were very impressed. Thank you so much for sending it with strings already set. It doesn't feel cheap either, everything looks very well put together. Sounds good when tuned up. Seller is very attentive, 5 star definitely deserved. I'm very satisfied with my purchase. The strings went out of tune in the begining not as much as I thought. My kid plays it every day. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, great value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap ukulele for my baby to play with that I wouldn’t mind getting damaged, since she loved strumming on her babysitter’s ukulele, and this fit the bill. The purple color is really shiny and vibrant, and I love that it came with so many accessories. It looked so nice and sounded surprisingly good that I decided to learn how to play as well. Great starter instrument at least, and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: So much more beautiful in person than shown on the monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I own several guitars , but my heart skipped a beat when I stumbled upon this little beauty! The sound is to die for! I keep it next to my couch and simply grab it and rock a little ! Brings a smile to my face every time I glance at it! Special thanks to HOLA MUSIC for making my day with this little piece of art! Worth The money and then some :)
customer_reviews.author: LonerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great uke
customer_reviews.text: As a ukulele player (6 months and going strong) this little uke actually has a good sound to it, and would be wonderful for a beginner. I bought it for my nephew because he wanted a red ukulele. He is 4 years old btw. He loves it and it has held up well. The only criticism is the bolts were the strings go, one of them is a little off looking. It’s as if it isn’t right enough.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: love this ukulele!!
customer_reviews.text: my 14 year old daughter decided one day she wanted a ukulele. i read so many reviews and bought her this one. at first i thought this size (soprono) would be too small but it is great!!!! she spends hours teaching herself how to play (thank you youtube) and is enjoying it tremendously. I bought the a clip on tuner which is very helpful. the first few times she played she had to tune it over again but after a week or so it stayed tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rivka Morris

customer_reviews.title: Ukulele's ALL need constant tuning for a minute. Duh.
customer_reviews.text: I really have no complaints with this ukulele, especially for the price. I had to re-tune it a lot for the first couple of days... Because it was a new ukulele. I see people giving 1 star reviews for a product just because they don't know it's typical nature. That's so unfair to the Business owners. I didn't give 5 star because of a MINOR imperfection on the finish that was touched up with clear (instead of color then topped with clear) so the wood shows through. In an inconspicuous spot I didn't notice right away.
customer_reviews.author: thischic

customer_reviews.title: Item received looked like it went to hell and back
customer_reviews.text: Item received looked like it went to hell and back. Bag was ripped, and words printed on it looked faded and cracked. Color was not right and looked all grimy. Was returned, and ordered from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect instrument for the begginer!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product for our 8 y/o son to get him started and it's perfect for him. He loves it and is so cute when he sits and trys to tune it the way his music teacher showed him. The product arrived in great condition and we love the little extras that come with it as well as the price which didn't put a strain on the budget. We love that we get to share our love of music with him without breaking the bank for a finely crafted instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: He has always been an amateur guitar player and I thought this would be a good gift. From my understanding (****keep in mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He has always been an amateur guitar player and I thought this would be a good gift. From my understanding (****keep in mind, I am not very guitar-savvy****) it is a good ukulele for the price. If you are looking for something for a beginner to play around with that also wont break with a few plays, this is a good option. I should also say though that I bought some new strings for it before I gave it to him because I read that good strings can make a world of difference on a not so great guitar.
customer_reviews.author: e.rowe

customer_reviews.title: great for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Daughter wanted a purple ukulele as a gift. It arrived quickly and in great shape. We thought the strings might need some stretching but it was fine from day 1. She loves it and it is a great size. I have also enjoyed learning some basic cords and overall think this is a decent quality instrument, especially for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: M. Birnbaum

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this instrument for my daughter for her birthday, which was today. She hasn't begun to learn how to play it yet, but it is a beautiful pink and seems to be well-made. It was also delivered in plenty of time and when it was supposed to be. I would buy from this company again and would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a parent gift for my granddaughter to give her mommy & daddy on her 2nd Birthday 🤣 I figured it was a perfect opportunity for them to learn themselves so they could teach her! Neither of them are musically inclined - so we will see how this goes. The purple is absolutely gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Omnitrition IMA, Authorized Distributor 66351

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you are looking for!
customer_reviews.text: honestly it depends on what you are looking for! This is a great quality put together instrument as far as the box goes. the strings are plastic strings not wire strings, so when i try and tune it it does ok but doesn't always hold well, so like I said it depends on what you are looking for. My 7 yo son saved for half and I paid for the other half which he worked hard for and he has not been disappointed at all! It will either spark his interest enough to progress with it or not. Its definitely a good halfway purchase if you have someone who may or may not use it!
customer_reviews.author: hbdharper

customer_reviews.title: Very happy daughter
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the purple one for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! It's very cute, works well and is perfect to learn on. We are not experts, this is our first purchase of this type of product, but are extremely pleased with the purple ukelele, and love that it came with the strap and picks so it's all ready to go. Ordering and shipping we're easy and arrived well within the water time frame.
customer_reviews.author: jesejames

customer_reviews.title: Stay Tuned for More...
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for the whimsical color because I am easily amused and like brightly colored things, as does my wife. 1 star because it shipped quick and the description was spot-on 1 star for basic craftsmanship we'll stop there 2 stars removed because it won't stay tuned. Ever. For any length of time. Even with new strings. I go plink, plink, PLANK, BLURGH, BAD TWANG within a few notes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Toy ukulele with nice color options
customer_reviews.text: The action is very high making it much harder for young players to play successfully. Colors are fun. Keeps in tune ok after strings stretch but I wish I had purchased something else and spent just a little more for a younger child’s beginner ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H

customer_reviews.title: Saw some pretty convincing reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the intention of traveling/backpacking with a lower costing ukulele. I didn't want to risk losing my other ukes at the airport so i searched for a lower end make. Saw some pretty convincing reviews. I bought the blue one and it was a little frustrating. I honestly almost returned the thing. I read that it needed to be broken in by playing but it seemed hopeless. But then it eventually came around, it sounds great! Don't give up, it's a great little instrument. It would make a great starter uke. Just tune often until it's broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Received this Ukelele bundle with tote bag, strap and picks as a gift for our granddaughter. Prompt delivery. There was an issue with the order but Hola was very quick to resolve and ship missing item. The quality of the instrument is better than expected. Great finish on wooden body and neck. Our granddaughter was strumming a passable melody in minutes of receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Cheehy

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for our son to keep him interested in music lessons. He loves it. He likes how it fits in his hands and it's perfect size for him. The strap was a bit to figure out and he doesn't use it most of the time. Love all the extras with it.
customer_reviews.author: Princessmp79

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great starter ukulele! Came when we expected the bag strap and pick make it a Great choice. My daughter loves it. She turned it and was having fun in no time. I would recommend this item. It seems a little fragile... So I wouldn't recommend it for very young children. (My daughter has been taking care of instruments for about 4years )
customer_reviews.author: C Rudisill

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've had and been playing this ukulele now for over a month and I'm very happy with it. It came exactly as described with all of the accessories mentioned. It tunes well and after playing it for a few weeks, keeps its tune well for several days, just as the seller mentioned. Bear in mind, I'm new to playing instruments and to ukuleles in general so I'm not too knowledgeable about what to look for but this has done the job for me quite well. I would definitely recommend it, especially for beginner players like myself who aren't looking to get too serious with it or spend too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Alonso

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, get it.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has an acoustic and an electric guitar and he’s been playing ukulele songs on them lately so I figured I’d get him a ukulele. He was here when the package arrived so I just gave it to him as an early gift and he loves it. He tuned it up and he hasn’t had to retune it since and it’s been about a week. He checks it all the time but it’s always either correct o just needs a minor adjustment. It sounds great. It’s a gorgeous color. I’m very pleased with it. It makes a great gift. And it comes with a cute little bag and a strap and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bmcquiston

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful music in my house.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old is on a: I want to learn every instrument possible: phase. Within two weeks she learned this instrument and brings tears to my eyes every time she plays a song on this. She loves this instrument the most of the five I’ve provided. Her only complaint is the strap is not as useful as she thought it would be. That’s really no big deal. Buy this for kids that want to learn how to play! It’s so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something nice enough for my kids to learn on and hang up on the wall. This was a great deal! At first I was bummed I didn't have a tuner but then I Downloaded a free tuning app to my phone. YouTube provides hours of free lessons too.
customer_reviews.author: thesavants08

customer_reviews.title: Great starter uke!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little started uke. It would have gotten 5 stars if the paint job was perfect. I accidentally ordered 2. Keeping both! My husband and I are now learning together. Definitely worth the money if you are just starting to learn how to play. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: cbeecher

customer_reviews.title: It jumps notes
customer_reviews.text: It's colorful and pretty looking, however, I bought this for my daughter to learn on, ended up not being able to use it. Some of the cords jump notes, which it's not supposed to. I had it professionally tuned and looked over and it skipped for them too. We had to buy something else and got a Luna concerto to learn on. We could not return it as it was a Xmas gift and it passed the 30 days by the time they got it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: It sound and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift. Personally I don’t play a string instrument, but the ukulele looks wonderful and strumming the strings I liked the sound. It was easy to press the strings down onto the frets in different places and the notes had a clear sound. I think our granddaughters will be very happy with it. I would recommend this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our three year old grandson for Christmas. Every time he visits his cousin, he looks for her guitar and plays with it. We may have an upcoming musician in the family! The quality is great and we love that it comes in colors. His favorite color is black so we were able to get this in his favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Dort

product_meta.title: Hola! Music HM-21BU Soprano Ukulele Bundle with Canvas Tote Bag, Strap and Picks, Color Series, Blue
feature_bullets: Hola! Music HM-21BU Soprano Ukulele Bundle with Canvas Tote Bag, Strap and Picks, Color Series - Blue
Top, Back and sides constructed of maple and painted in a variety of beautiful colors. Fingerboard and Bridge constructed of Rosewood.
Equipped with white nylon strings and silver geared tuners, 12 silver nickel frets with fret position marks at 5th, 7th and 10th frets on top of fingerboard.
Crafted to allow you to create warm, pitch-perfect Hawaiian harmonies, this ukulele is the best gift you can buy for yourself or your loved one!
Don't miss!! Full description, images and specifications down the page. Hola! Music guarantees quality and affordability. Hola! - Say Hello to Music!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,481 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
